findoptions.findoption: Find only archive files
Colorize console output*
Do not colorize console output*
Set output mode to debug
Exclude archive files (bz2, gz, tar, zip)*
Exclude hidden files and directories*
Print this usage and exit
Include archive files (bz2, gz, tar, zip)
Include hidden files and directories
Specify extension for archive files to include in find
Specify name pattern for archive files to include in find
Specify name pattern for directories to include in find
Specify extension for files to include in find
Specify name pattern for files to include in find
File type to find (text, binary)
Generate a list of the matching directories after finding
Generate a list of the matching files after finding
Do not find recursively (no subdirectories)
Specify extension for archive files to exclude from find
Specify name pattern for archive files to exclude from find
Specify name pattern for directories to exclude from find
Specify extension for files to exclude from find
Specify name pattern for files to exclude from find
File type not to find (text, binary)

A path to a JSON file with specified find settings
Set output mode to verbose
